nodes.text: Spirit of Solaris, originally named Pride of Aridus was an infiltration ship of the Alliance Special Forces under the command of Captain Nord.

In 4 ABY, the Pride of Aridus dropped off a Rebel commando team on an Imperial world. When the team was late, second-mate Alfonso Luiz Obota mutinied against Nord, who wished to leave the team behind. Five of the Aridus' crewmen, and all but three commandos, were killed in the rescue attempt, and Obota was imprisoned as a result. Later it was renamed Spirit of Solaris.
